Properties.Description: Logverz Controller Coordinates worker lambdas

WorkerConcurrency.Description: This specifies the maximum number of workers running parralel. By default the function is set to the 60% of the unused account level concurrency.

LogverzControllerRole.Description: Creating Logverz controller service role in IAM for AWS CodeBuild.

LogverzWorkerPolicy.Description: Setting IAM policy for service role for Logverz Worker Role

Properties.Name: /Logverz/Engine/Schemas/CloudTrail
Properties.Value:
{
"Schema":[
"'eventVersion':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'userIdentity':{type: Sequelize.JSON},",
"'eventTime':{type: Sequelize.DATE},",
"'eventSource':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'eventName':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'awsRegion':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'sourceIPAddress':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'userAgent':{type: Sequelize.STRING(512)},",
"'errorCode':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'errorMessage':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8192)},",
"'requestParameters':{type: Sequelize.JSON},",
"'responseElements':{type: Sequelize.JSON},",
"'additionalEventData':{type: Sequelize.JSON},",
"'requestID':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'eventID':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'eventType':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'recipientAccountId':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'vpcEndpointId':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'serviceEventDetails': {type: Sequelize.JSON},",
"'readOnly':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'resources': {type: Sequelize.JSON}"],
"S3SelectParameters":{
  "IO":{
    "InputSerialization":{
      "Compression":"GZIP",
      "JsonType":"LINES",
      "RootElement":"Records"
    }
  },
  "Cast":{
      "eventTime": {
        "format": "TBD",
        "postfix": "Z"
      }
    }
},
"Views": [{
  "Default":[
    "eventTime",
    "sourceIPAddress",
    "eventName",
    "errorCode"
]},{
  "Origin":[
    "eventTime",
    "eventSource",
    "userAgent",
    "eventName",
    "errorMessage"
]}],
"Indexes": [],
"TransForms": []
}

Properties.Name: /Logverz/Engine/Schemas/VPCFlow
Properties.Value:
{"Schema": [
"'version':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'account-id':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'interface-id':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'srcaddr':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'dstaddr':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'srcport':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'dstport':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'protocol':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'packets':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'bytes':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'start':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'end':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'action':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'log-status':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'vpc-id':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'subnet-id':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'instance-id':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'tcp-flags':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'pkt-srcaddr': {type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'pkt-dstaddr':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'region': {type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'az-id': {type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'sublocation-type': {type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'sublocation-id': {type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'pkt-src-aws-service':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'pkt-dst-aws-service':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'flow-direction':{type: Sequelize.STRING(16)},",
"'traffic-path':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER}"
],
"S3SelectParameters":{
  "IO":{
    "InputSerialization":{
      "Compression":"GZIP",
      "CSV": {
        "FileHeaderInfo": "USE",
        "FieldDelimiter": " "
      }
    }
  },
  "Cast":{
      "version": "int",
      "account-id": "int",
      "srcport": "int",
      "dstport": "int",
      "protocol": "int",
      "packets": "int",
      "bytes": "int",
      "start": "int",
      "end": "int",
      "traffic-path": "int"
    }
},
"Views": [{
  "Default":[
    "srcaddr",
    "dstaddr",
    "srcport",
    "dstport",
    "packets",
    "bytes",
    "action"
]},{
  "Extended":[
    "interface-id",
    "srcaddr",
    "dstaddr",
    "srcport",
    "dstport",
    "packets",
    "bytes",
    "action",
    "vpc-id",
    "subnet-id"
]}],
"Indexes": [],
"TransForms": []}
Properties.Description: Logverz VPC Flow logs DataSource Schema definition.

Properties.Name: /Logverz/Engine/Schemas/ApplicationLB
Properties.Value:
{"Schema":[
"'type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'timestamp':{type: Sequelize.DATE},",
"'elb':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'client:port':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'target:port':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'request_processing_time':{type: Sequelize.DOUBLE},",
"'target_processing_time':{type: Sequelize.DOUBLE},",
"'response_processing_time':{type: Sequelize.DOUBLE},",
"'elb_status_code':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'target_status_code':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'received_bytes':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'sent_bytes':{type: Sequelize.BIGINT},",
"'request':{type: Sequelize.STRING(4096)},",
"'user_agent':{type: Sequelize.STRING(1024)},",
"'ssl_cipher':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'ssl_protocol':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'target_group_arn':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'trace_id':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'domain_name':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'chosen_cert_arn': {type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'matched_rule_priority':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'request_creation_time': {type: Sequelize.DATE},",
"'actions_executed':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'redirect_url': {type: Sequelize.STRING(2048)},",
"'error_reason':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'target:port_list': {type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'target_status_code_list':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'classification':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'classification_reason':{type: Sequelize.STRING}"],
"S3SelectParameters":{
  "IO":{
    "InputSerialization":{
      "Compression":"GZIP",
      "CSV": {
        "FileHeaderInfo": "NONE",
        "FieldDelimiter": " "
      }
    },
    "OutputSerialization":{
      "CSV":{
        "RecordDelimiter":";;",
        "FieldDelimiter":" "
      }
    }
  },
  "Cast":{
    "request_processing_time":"float",
    "target_processing_time":"float",
    "response_processing_time":"float",
    "elb_status_code":"int",
    "target_status_code":"int",
    "received_bytes":"int",
    "sent_bytes":"int",
    "matched_rule_priority":"int",
    "target_status_code_list":"int",
    "timestamp":{
        "format":"TBD",
        "postfix":"Z"
    },
    "request_creation_time":{
        "format":"TBD",
        "postfix":"Z"
    }
  }
},
"Views": [{
  "Default":[
    "timestamp",
    "elb",
    "client:port",
    "elb_status_code",
    "request"
]},{
  "HTTP":[
    "timestamp",
    "request",
    "user_agent",
    "ssl_cipher",
    "ssl_protocol"
]}],
"Indexes": [],
"TransForms": []}

Properties.Name: /Logverz/Engine/Schemas/CloudFront
Properties.Value:
{"Schema": ["'date':{type: Sequelize.DATE},",
"'time':{type: Sequelize.STRING(16)},",
"'x-edge-location':{type: Sequelize.STRING(16)},",
"'sc-bytes':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'c-ip':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'cs-method':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'cs(Host)':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'cs-uri-stem':{type: Sequelize.STRING(2048)},",
"'sc-status':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'cs(Referer)':{type: Sequelize.STRING(2048)},",
"'cs(User-Agent)':{type: Sequelize.STRING(1024)},",
"'cs-uri-query':{type: Sequelize.STRING(2048)},",
"'cs(Cookie)':{type: Sequelize.STRING(2048)},",
"'x-edge-result-type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'x-edge-request-id':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'x-host-header':{type: Sequelize.STRING(128)},",
"'cs-protocol':{type: Sequelize.STRING(8)},",
"'cs-bytes':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'time-taken':{type: Sequelize.DOUBLE},",
"'x-forwarded-for':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'ssl-protocol':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'ssl-cipher':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'x-edge-response-result-type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(32)},",
"'cs-protocol-version':{type: Sequelize.STRING(16)},",
"'fle-status':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'fle-encrypted-fields':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'c-port':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'time-to-first-byte':{type: Sequelize.DOUBLE},",
"'x-edge-detailed-result-type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'sc-content-type':{type: Sequelize.STRING(64)},",
"'sc-content-len':{type: Sequelize.INTEGER},",
"'sc-range-start':{type: Sequelize.STRING},",
"'sc-range-end':{type: Sequelize.STRING}"
],
"S3SelectParameters":{
  "IO":{
    "InputSerialization":{
      "Compression":"GZIP",
      "CSV": {
        "FileHeaderInfo": "NONE",
        "FieldDelimiter": "\\t"
      }
    },
    "OutputSerialization":{
      "CSV":{
        "RecordDelimiter":";!",
        "FieldDelimiter":" "
      }
    }
  },
  "Cast":{
      "time-taken": "float",
      "time-to-first-byte": "float",
      "sc-bytes": "int",
      "sc-status": "int",
      "cs-bytes": "int",
      "c-port": "int",
      "sc-content-len": "int",
      "eventTime": {
        "format": "TBD",
        "postfix": "Z"
      }
    }
},
"Views":  [{
  "Default":[
    "date",
    "time",
    "cs-uri-stem",
    "cs-method"
]}],
"Indexes": [],
"TransForms": []}

Properties.Name: /Logverz/Settings/IdleTime
Properties.Description:
Providing ASG minimum count equals to 0, the time (in minutes) after the WebRTC Proxy (Container Host) considered not in use and shutsdown to save cost.
 Setting honors ASG minimum value ie ASG minimum count 1 will prevent ASG shutdown.
   Configuration options for RDS: "C" only CPU limit triggers,"S" only Session limit (DB connection count) triggers."CAS" Cpu AND Session triggers , "COS" either Cpu OR Session triggers scaling event.
   Configuration options Turnservice: total combined traffic in+out less than specified value. As for "StartAfterUTC" parameter use 24h time format such as 08:00 or 19:00.

JobsQueue.Description: The Queue where the Search jobs are stored.

LogverzJobsQDeadLetter.Description: The Queue where the Search jobs are stored.
